resources.name: dutch_elderly.csv
resources.title: dutch_elderly.csv
resources.description: A table of data from the dutch_elderly.csv file.

fields.name: Stature
fields.description: The vertical distance from the floor to the top of the head (vertex).

fields.name: Eye height, standing
fields.description: Vertical distance between the standing surface and the inner corner of the right eye.

fields.name: Shoulder height
fields.description: Vertical distance from the standing surface to the acromion.

fields.name: Elbow height, standing
fields.description: Vertical distance from the floor to the lowest bony point of the elbow.

fields.name: Fist height, standing
fields.description: The vertical distance from the floor to the middle of the grip device in the fist.

fields.name: Thigh clearance, sitting
fields.description: Vertical distance from the seat to the highest point on the superior surface of the thigh at the abdominal-thigh junction.

fields.name: Shoulder-elbow length
fields.description: The maximum vertical distance from the acromion to the lowest bony point of the flexed elbow.

fields.name: Elbow height, sitting
fields.description: Vertical distance from the sitting surface to the lowest bony point of the elbow with the underarm horizontal. In some datasets this measure is calculated by subtracting shoulder-elbow length from shoulder height.

fields.name: Popliteal height, sitting
fields.description: The vertical distance from the footrest surface to the hollow of the knee.

fields.name: Shoulder height, sitting
fields.description: The vertical distance from the seat to the acromion.

fields.name: Eye height, sitting
fields.description: The vertical distance from the seat to the inner corner of the right eye.

fields.name: Sitting height
fields.description: The vertical distance from the seat to the vertex (top of the head).

fields.name: Arm length
fields.description: The horizontal distance from the back of the measuring chair to the most distal point of the grip device.

fields.name: Breadth over the elbows
fields.description: The maximum horizontal distance between the lateral sides of the elbows.

fields.name: Shoulder breadth (bi-deltoid)
fields.description: The horizontal breath across the shoulders.

fields.name: Hip breadth, sitting
fields.description: The maximum horizontal distance across the hips, parallel to the seat.

fields.name: Abdominal depth
fields.description: The horizontal distance from the back of the measuring chair to the most distal point of the abdomen.

fields.name: Elbow-grip length
fields.description: The maximum horizontal distance between the lowest bony point of the flexed elbow and the middle of the grip device.

fields.name: Buttock-popliteal depth
fields.description: The horizontal distance from the back of the measuring chair to the hollow of the knee parallel of the long axis of the upper leg.

fields.name: Buttock-knee depth, sitting
fields.description: The horizontal distance from the posterior surface of the right buttock to the anterior surface of the right knee parallel to the long axis of the upper leg.

fields.name: Foot length
fields.description: The maximum horizontal distance from the heel of the longest toe of the right foot unshod, parallel to the long axis of the foot.

fields.name: Foot breadth
fields.description: The maximum width across the ball of the right foot unshod.

fields.name: Hand length
fields.description: The distance from the wrist crease tot the tip of the middle finger, parallel to the fingers.

fields.name: Hand width (without thumb)
fields.description: The distance from the radial to ulnar side of the hand, measured at the distal extremities of the metacarpals.

fields.name: Thumb breadth
fields.description: The maximum distance from the radial to the ulnar side of the thumb at the distal interphalangial joint.

fields.name: Forefinger breadth
fields.description: The maximum distance from the radial to the ulnair side of the forefinger at the middle of the distal phalanx.

fields.name: Grip circumference
fields.description: The maximum circumference of the circle, made by the thumb and forefinger when enclosing a cone.

fields.name: Ear length
fields.description: The maximum distance from the highest tot the lowest point of the auricle.

fields.name: Body mass
fields.description: Total mass of the body

fields.name: Maximum gripping force
fields.description: The maximum gripping force of a hand exerted for 3 seconds.

fields.name: Pushing force with 2 hands
fields.description: Maximum pushing force using both arms and hands together, exerted for 3 seconds.

fields.name: Pulling force 1 hand
fields.description: Maximum pulling force of one hand, exerted for 3 seconds.

fields.name: Torque with two hands
fields.description: Maximum static torque of two hands and arms, exerted for 3 seconds.

fields.name: Rotation of head towards left
fields.description: Maximum rotation of the head towards the left.

fields.name: Rotation of head towards right
fields.description: Maximum rotation of the head towards the right.

fields.name: Rotation of head backwards
fields.description: Maximum backward bending (extension) of the head.

fields.name: Rotation of head toward chest
fields.description: Maximum forward bending (flexion) of the head.

fields.name: Bending of head towards right shoulder
fields.description: Maximum sideward bending of the head towards the right.

fields.name: Bending of head towards left shoulder
fields.description: Maximum sideward bending of the head towards the left.

fields.name: Pronation
fields.description: Maximum rotation of the wrist inward.

fields.name: Supination
fields.description: Maximum rotation of the wrist outward.

fields.name: Extension hand
fields.description: Maximum upward bending of the stretched preferred hand from the wrist.

fields.name: Flexion hand
fields.description: Maximum downward bending of the stretched preferred hand from the wrist.

fields.name: Radial deviation
fields.description: Maximum radial abduction of the stretched preferred hand from the wrist.

fields.name: Ulnar deviation
fields.description: Maximum ulnar abduction of the stretched preferred hand from the wrist.

fields.name: Forefinger flexion
fields.description: Maximum downward bending of the stretched forefinger of the preferred hand.

fields.name: Step-up height
fields.description: Vertical distance covered in one comfortable step upwards.

resources.name: caesar_(nl).csv
resources.title: caesar_(nl).csv
resources.description: A table of data from the caesar_(nl).csv file.

fields.name: Stature
fields.description: The vertical distance from the floor to the top of the head (vertex).

fields.name: Arm length
fields.description: The horizontal distance from the back of the measuring chair to the most distal point of the grip device.

fields.name: Shoulder breadth (bi-deltoid)
fields.description: The horizontal breath across the shoulders.

fields.name: Head breadth
fields.description: Maximum breadth of the head above the ears measured perpendicular to the midsagittal plane.

fields.name: Head circumference
fields.description: Maximum about horizontal circumference of the head measured just the glabella and over the opisthocranion.

fields.name: Chest circumference
fields.description: Circumference of the chest measured at nipple level.

fields.name: Waist circumference
fields.description: Circumference of trunk at a level midway between the lowest ribs and upper ilia crest.

fields.name: Body mass
fields.description: Total mass of the body

fields.name: Crotch height
fields.description: Vertical distance from the floor to the distal part of the inferior ramus of the pubic bone.

fields.name: Thigh circumference
fields.description: Maximum circumference of the thigh.

fields.name: Face length
fields.description: The length of the face, from menton to sellion or chin to nasal root.

fields.name: Nasal root breadth
fields.description: The width of the nasal root, from left to right maxillofrontale.

fields.name: Nose length
fields.description: The length of the nose, from sellion to subnasale.

fields.name: Nose bridge length
fields.description: The length of the nasal bridge, from sellion to pronasale.

fields.name: Nasal tip protrusion
fields.description: The depth of the tip of the nose, from subnasale to pronasale.

fields.name: Nose width
fields.description: The width of the nose, from left to right alare.

fields.name: Bigonial breadth
fields.description: Distance from left to right gonion.

fields.name: Bitragion breadth
fields.description: Distance between the left and right tragion.

fields.name: Nasal root protrusion
fields.description: Distance from the sellion to the line between left and right maxillofrontale.

fields.name: Relative Nasal Tip Protrusion
fields.description: A relative measure of nasal tip protrusion measured as the ratio of Nasal Tip Protrusion over Nose Length, in percentage.

resources.name: dutch_children.csv
resources.title: dutch_children.csv
resources.description: A table of data from the dutch_children.csv file.

fields.name: Stature
fields.description: The vertical distance from the floor to the top of the head (vertex).

fields.name: Eye height, standing
fields.description: Vertical distance between the standing surface and the inner corner of the right eye.

fields.name: Shoulder height
fields.description: Vertical distance from the standing surface to the acromion.

fields.name: Head height
fields.description: The height of the head perpendicular to the Frankfort Plane, from menton to vertex.

fields.name: Thigh clearance, sitting
fields.description: Vertical distance from the seat to the highest point on the superior surface of the thigh at the abdominal-thigh junction.

fields.name: Instep height
fields.description: The vertical distance from the footrest surface to the instep (the junction of the lower (the junction of the lower leg and foot).

fields.name: Chin-crown height
fields.description: The rectilinear distance from chin to crown.

fields.name: Elbow height, sitting
fields.description: Vertical distance from the sitting surface to the lowest bony point of the elbow with the underarm horizontal. In some datasets this measure is calculated by subtracting shoulder-elbow length from shoulder height.

fields.name: Popliteal height, sitting
fields.description: The vertical distance from the footrest surface to the hollow of the knee.

fields.name: Shoulder height, sitting
fields.description: The vertical distance from the seat to the acromion.

fields.name: Eye height, sitting
fields.description: The vertical distance from the seat to the inner corner of the right eye.

fields.name: Sitting height
fields.description: The vertical distance from the seat to the vertex (top of the head).

fields.name: Reach height, sitting
fields.description: The vertical distance from the horizontal surface to the mid-point of the grip device.

fields.name: Arm length
fields.description: The horizontal distance from the back of the measuring chair to the most distal point of the grip device.

fields.name: Breadth over the elbows
fields.description: The maximum horizontal distance between the lateral sides of the elbows.

fields.name: Shoulder breadth (bi-deltoid)
fields.description: The horizontal breath across the shoulders.

fields.name: Head breadth
fields.description: Maximum breadth of the head above the ears measured perpendicular to the midsagittal plane.

fields.name: Hip breadth
fields.description: Maximum breadth across the hips.

fields.name: Hip breadth, sitting
fields.description: The maximum horizontal distance across the hips, parallel to the seat.

fields.name: Chest depth
fields.description: The maximum horizontal distance between the front and the back of the trunk at the nipples.

fields.name: Buttock-popliteal depth
fields.description: The horizontal distance from the back of the measuring chair to the hollow of the knee parallel of the long axis of the upper leg.

fields.name: Buttock-knee depth, sitting
fields.description: The horizontal distance from the posterior surface of the right buttock to the anterior surface of the right knee parallel to the long axis of the upper leg.

fields.name: Buttock foot length, sitting
fields.description: The horizontal distance from the buttock to the sole of the foot of the stretched leg.

fields.name: Head circumference
fields.description: Maximum about horizontal circumference of the head measured just the glabella and over the opisthocranion.

fields.name: Upperarm circumference
fields.description: Maximum circumference of the upper arm perpendicular to the long axis of the body, midway between shoulder and elbow.

fields.name: Foot length
fields.description: The maximum horizontal distance from the heel of the longest toe of the right foot unshod, parallel to the long axis of the foot.

fields.name: Foot breadth
fields.description: The maximum width across the ball of the right foot unshod.

fields.name: Hand length
fields.description: The distance from the wrist crease tot the tip of the middle finger, parallel to the fingers.

fields.name: Hand width (without thumb)
fields.description: The distance from the radial to ulnar side of the hand, measured at the distal extremities of the metacarpals.

fields.name: Thumb breadth
fields.description: The maximum distance from the radial to the ulnar side of the thumb at the distal interphalangial joint.

fields.name: Hand thickness
fields.description: The maximum distance between the palm and the back of the hand at the middle finger joint.

fields.name: Pink breadth
fields.description: Maximum distance between the palm and the back of the hand at the middle finger joint.

fields.name: Middlefinger length
fields.description: Distance from the skin crease at the middle finger to the tip of the middle finger, parallel to the long axis of the middle finger.

fields.name: Hand diameter
fields.description: Minimum diameter of the hand, when in its smallest configuration.

fields.name: Grip circumference
fields.description: The maximum circumference of the circle, made by the thumb and forefinger when enclosing a cone.

fields.name: Body mass
fields.description: Total mass of the body

fields.name: Step-up height
fields.description: Vertical distance covered in one comfortable step upwards.

fields.name: Lower face length
fields.description: The length of the lower part of the face, from subnasale to gnathion.

fields.name: Intercanthal width

fields.name: Nasal root breadth

fields.name: Height of chin

fields.name: Face length short

fields.name: Sellion promentale length

name: dined-tables
title: Dined tabular Data
description: A data package consisting of tables describing 1D dimensional anthropometric data.
